document.text: The Writers Guild of America went on strike on November 4, 2007,McNary, Dave & Littleton, Cynthia, (November 2, 2007) "", ''Variety''. Retrieved on November 3, 2007. by which time only eight of the planned sixteen episodes of ''Lost'''s fourth season had been written.Lindelof, Damon & Cuse, Carlton, (November 5, 2007) "", ''Variety''.
